name: Chef Regretulus, the Five-Star Fleshsmith
description: Once a top-rated galactic TV chef, Regretulus now resides on Floor 7's kitchen-themed dungeon wing, forever cursed to refine meat-based horror into culinary chaos. Wears a blood-stained apron and wields a flamethrower spatula.

abilities.name: Sous Vide Sear
abilities.description: Applies Burning Flesh (DoT) near boiling cauldrons.

abilities.name: Exploding Charcuterie
abilities.description: Exploding meat platter leaves greasy hazards.

abilities.name: Taste of Regret
abilities.description: Consumes a corpse to heal and debuff nearby players.

name: Professor Grey Matter, the Uselessly Overqualified Brain
description: A floating, mutated alien brain in a VR headset attached to a failing drone platform. Rants constantly about his unappreciated credentials while launching psychic assaults.

abilities.name: Thesis Beam
abilities.description: Deals psychic damage and silences recent ability users.

abilities.name: Overanalyze
abilities.description: Confuses the most buffed player for 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Bibliocaust
abilities.description: Flaming encyclopedias fall in chaotic AOE.

name: Chucklegrin, the Final Clown
description: The last surviving warrior of the Laughing Court, Chucklegrin fuses necromancy with carnival aesthetics. He juggles skulls and shouts puns that cause actual bleeding.

abilities.name: Dead Man’s Punchline
abilities.description: Stuns players who fail to resist a horrible pun.

abilities.name: Balloon Animal Horror
abilities.description: Summons balloon beast to chase a random player.

abilities.name: Paint the Tent Red
abilities.description: Spins and flings knives and gore in circular AOE.
